Interface IPasswordPolicy

Interface containig methods to set the password policy for user passwords.

Namespace: ManageUsers.BusinessLogic.Interface
Assembly: ManageUsers.dll
Syntax
public interface IPasswordPolicy

Methods

DefaultPolicyAsync()

Sets the password policy to minimum 6 characters.

Declaration
Task DefaultPolicyAsync()
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

SetPolicyAsync(Boolean, Boolean, Boolean)

Sets if the password policy should be set to contain at least one upper case letter, number and/or special character.

Declaration
Task SetPolicyAsync(bool upperCaseLetter, bool number, bool specialCharacter)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Boolean upperCaseLetter

True if password must contain at least one upper case letter, false otherwise
System.Boolean number

True if password must contain at least one number, false otherwise
System.Boolean specialCharacter

True if password must contain at least one special character, false otherwise
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

SetPolicyAsync(Int32)

Sets the password policy minimum password length.

Declaration
Task SetPolicyAsync(int minimumLength)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 minimumLength

Sets the minimum amount of characters in the password. Minumum accepted value is 6
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

SetPolicyAsync(Int32, Boolean, Boolean, Boolean)

Sets the minimum password length and if the password policy should be set to contain at least one upper case letter, number and/or special character.

Declaration
Task SetPolicyAsync(int minimumLength, bool upperCaseLetter, bool number, bool specialCharacter)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 minimumLength

Sets the minimum amount of characters in the password. Minumum accepted value is 6
System.Boolean upperCaseLetter

True if password must contain at least one upper case letter, false otherwise
System.Boolean number

True if password must contain at least one number, false otherwise
System.Boolean specialCharacter

True if password must contain at least one special character, false otherwise
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task
